import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { CheckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Modal({route,message,title,routePageMessage}) { const [open, setOpen] = useState(true) const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} ​
